title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges
column3: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War
column3: the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.

title: Iron Man
column3: Tony Stark creates a suit of armor to become the superhero Iron Man.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers becomes Captain America to defend freedom during World War II.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years
column3: finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of decency.
